page.title: 10Jobs 2.
page.content: But although some local labour is used it is not what was hoped for. Because employment is largely dependant on tourism it means that ther are far more people unemployed in winter. Morecambe has a high proportion of elderly residents. It is an attractive area to retire to. Because of this there has been a big increase in retirement and nursing homes and because the holiday trade has declined many hotels have become residential homes for the elderly. Like the hotels they require catering and cleaning staff and in addition nursing staff. There is some light industry on the newly created White Lund Industrial estate but without the employment created by tourism Morecambe would be a very different place.
